content.rendered:
Adventus
Professional
Services (APS)

Expert services to take on the heavy lifting and ensure you provide a market-leading service to international students and agents, without changing your systems or process.
London Metropolitan University and APS

“The time-consuming, but essential, activities in our admissions processes are now delivered more efficiently and at greater scale by market experts and we have the confidence through our partnership with Adventus that growth can be achieved in tandem with high levels of quality control and visa compliance.”

Jenny Wilkinson – Director of International Recruitment & Business Development at London Metropolitan University

Learn more
Previous
Next

Why partner with APS?

Efficiency

Free up your team to focus on priorities by having dedicated experts acting as an extension of your admissions team

Compliance

Mitigate the risk of visa refusals caused by unmanageable volume

Scalability

Access scalable resources that are responsive to surges in demand.

Service Levels

Improve customer services to agents and students.

Specialists

Our admissions experts review thousands of student applications each month

Rapid Implementation

We implement solutions within days and weeks, not months and years

Services include:

Application screening, credential evaluation and applicant follow up

Efficient admission support through applicant screening. We assess all application documents and the student’s credentials against your entry requirements. We also chase missing documents directly with applicants to ensure only high quality complete applications are submitted to the institution.

Assessment outcome and offer making

Share offer/reject assessment outcomes with your team, subject to pre-agreed admission and compliance criteria. Additional option to delegate authority to directly issue offers of admission.

In-Country Representation

APS provides a full-service in-country representation service for strategic institution partners in key source markets. This includes hiring, HR, legal, office space, all delivered in a white-labelled model according to your precise requirements.

Credibility interviews

Conduct virtual interviews and verify financial capability to further test genuineness of admitted students. This takes place prior to issuance of CAS/I-20/COE/LOA to maximise visa grant rates and reduce late stage attrition.

Application screening, credential evaluation and applicant follow up

Efficient admission support through applicant screening. We verify all applicant documents and assess the student’s credentials against your entry requirements. We also chase missing documents directly with applicants to ensure only high quality complete applications are submitted to the institution.

Offers of admission

Share admit/reject assessment outcome with, you subject to pre-agreed admission and compliance criteria. Option to delegate authority to directly issue Conditional Offers of Admission.

In-Country Representation

APS provides a full-service in-country representation service for strategic institution partners in key source markets. This includes hiring, HR, legal, office space, all delivered in a white-label model according to your precise requirements.

Pre-I20 eligibility assessment

Conduct virtual interviews and verify financial capability to further test genuineness of admitted students prior to issuance of I20 to maximise visa grant rates and reduce melt.

London Metropolitan University

How London Metropolitan University found success with Adventus.io Professional Services

Trusted by 0+ institutions globally

Talk to us

REQUEST DEMO
